Relevant Courses

Computer Networks

Studied network topologies, layers, local area networks, and performance measurement and analysis.

Operating Systems

Topics include process management, storage management, device management, performance, security, and case studies of common operating systems.

Applied Cryptography

An introduction to the basic theory and practice of cryptographic techniques used in computer secuirty. Topics include encryption, key management, hashing, network security protocols.

Computer Architecture

Architecture and organization of computer systems. Topics include the processor, control unit and microprogramming, computer arithmetic, memory hierarchy and memory management, input/output, instruction sets.

Cyber Futures

An overview that seeks to understand what is likely to continue, what is likely to change, and what is novel in the context of cyber.

Data Structures

The definition, representation, practical implementation, and manipulation of basic data structues such as arrays, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.

Embedded Systems

Assembly and C programming on a customizable microprocessor implemented on an FPGA board. Verilog components, RTOS, debugging techniques, state machines, software revision control, DSP programming.

Microprocessors

Introduction to microprocessor organization and operation, data manipulation, assembly and/or embedded-C language programming, serial communication, analog-to-digital conversion, timers, interrupts, DC motor control.

Computer Network Security

Overview of computer network security, broad coverage of cyber security concepts, computer network defense, computer network attack, and wireless security.

Software Design and Engineering

Design, construction and maintenance of large software systems. Project planning, requirements analysis, software design methodologies, software implementation and testing, maintenance.

Wireless and Mobile Security

Overview of wireless and mobile security providing students with practical and theoretical experiences. Topics include threat analysis, security infrastructure, security services, wireless network security components.

Work History

JBI Electric

Worked as electrician's assistant in a large team to help build the Kroger in Bossier City, LA. I wired circuits, layed pipe, installed components, and operated heavy machinery.

Cypress Electric

This was my father's company. I worked summers and weekends in his company from early high school until 2015. I wired residential housing and some commercial buildings.

Lone Oak Homes

Originally hired as a handyman, I performed any needed task. This included cleaning construction sites, houses, and maintaining property. I occasionally assist with technology related requests from the company's owners.

Pizza Hut

I delivered pizzas and worked in a team setting.
